question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. black umbrella
B. bicycle
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The bicycle is positioned further back in the scene, crossing the street behind the woman with the umbrella, while the umbrella is closer to the foreground, making a depth map helpful for accurate judgment.
